Articles.Content:
I'm having problems attaching air intakes. They seem to snap in to place and when I click to attach they do not stay. I had a similar problem involve IR with an accidental duplicate copy of files but this even happens with the stock parts. I have updated my output log.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/pm9wu4dn1aaq6i7/output_log.txt?dl=0

I would appreciate any help.

Thanks,

Nick
I have a similar problem with the .90 version of Interstellar altho removing that mod fixed the issue it made me sad that I couldnt play with interstellar

I have attached an image as I am trying to troubleshoot this problem. It is only air intakes and only when they are mirrored. You can see in pic that the non-mirrored intake is fine but I am still getting to exception in the debug log.
I believe it's a Tweakscale bug. Remove it and see if the issue is fixed.

It was tweakscale. Thanks

How do I mark it as Solved?

Edited January 30, 2015 by Delrey
On your OP, click Edit Post, then Go Advanced. You can change the thread prefix there.
